text:
ASME BPVC.II.A-2025 SA-989 /SA-989M 
S14. Certification 
S14.1 A manufacturer's certification shall be furnished to 
the purchaser stating that material has been manufactured, 
tested, and inspected in accordance with this specification, and 
that the test results on representative samples meet specifica­
tion requirement. A report of the test results shall be furnished. 
1477
